Hello there! I'm Mercedes Duncanson, a senior Business Analytics and Accounting student at Hamline University. Passionate about unraveling insights from data, my journey involves delving into the realms of econometrics, market research, and data mining.

This platform serves as a hub for my analytical research and datasets, providing a professional glimpse into my journey. As I navigate the realms of business analytics, my goal is to contribute meaningful perspectives to the evolving landscape.

Join me on this professional endeavor, where academia meets real-world application. Your interest is appreciated, and I look forward to sharing the impactful intersections of data and decision-making.
